text: Haldun Ozaktas from the Bilkent University, Bilkent, Turkey was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for contributions to transforms for signal processing in optics. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Bilkent University faculty Category:21st-century American engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Haldun Ozaktas
